title: Diamond Ruby Floral Nakshi Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
Natural Ruby Cabochons. Crafted with meticulous care using traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features an intricate floral design, meticulously crafted with sparkling diamonds. The classic Nakshi work (నక్షి పని) detailing adds a touch of traditional South Indian artistry. The two prominent floral pendants are accented by rich, red ruby cabochons, creating a captivating focal point. The articulated design ensures a comfortable and elegant drape.
occasions: and important cultural celebrations like Seemantham (సీమంతం)
Half-Saree function (లంగా ఓణి వేడుక). Also a sophisticated statement piece for high-end social events.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary diamond jewelry design. The brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the rich color of the rubies, creates a stunning and unforgettable look. Invest in a timeless piece that can be passed down as a treasured heirloom. The excellent craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value.
